abcd12:Rights.abcd12:TermsOfUse: The use of the data is allowed only for non-profit scientific use and for non-profit nature conservation purpose.

abcd12:Organisation.abcd12:OrganisationName: Muséum d'histoire naturelle de la Ville de Genève - MHNG

abcd12:Statements.abcd12:Acknowledgement: Ruedi M. Mammals housed at MHNG, Geneva. Muséum d'histoire naturelle de la Ville de Genève

abcd12:DatasetDerivation.abcd12:Description: This database lists all vouchers of mammals deposited at the Natural History Museum of Geneva and collected around the World since nearly two centuries.

abcd12:Organisation.abcd12:OrganisationName: Muséum d'histoire naturelle de la Ville de Genève - MHNG
